name: Claret Sword Dragon
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, look at three cards from the top of your deck, put any number of grade 1 cards from among them into your drop zone, and shuffle your deck. This unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn for each card put into the drop zone.
[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle it attacked, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & bind seven grade 1 cards from your drop zone], [Stand] this unit, and it gets drive -1 until end of turn.

name: Dragonic Vanquisher
effect:
[CONT](VC):During your turn, if a total of three or more of any player's cards were bound this turn, all of your front row units get [Power] +10000.
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of any player's front row rear-guards, and bind it. If your soul has a grade 3, you and your opponent choose a card from their hands, and bind it.

name: Last Card, Revonn
effect:
[ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][[Rest] one of your rear-guards], and your opponent's vanguard gets [Power] -5000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](VC):When it attacks, if you have five or more [Rest] rear-guards, until end of turn, this unit gets [Power] +15000/drive +1, and if your soul has a grade 3, it gets [Critical] +1.

name: Morion Spear Dragon
effect: [ACT](VC/RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 1 & discard a card from your hand], draw a card, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. If you discarded a grade 1 for this cost, it gets [Power] +10000 instead of +5000.

name: Cherishing Knight, Branwen
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if your drop zone has three or more grade 1 cards, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed from hand, look at five cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one grade 3 from among them and put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and if you put a card, discard a card from your hand.

name: Voltage Horn Dragon
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if any player's card was bound this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](RC):When it attacks a vanguard, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a column, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards in that front row, bind it, choose up to one of your opponent's rear-guards in that back row, and move it to an open (RC) in the same column.

name: Mighty Bolt Dragoon
effect:
[CONT](RC):During your turn, if any player's card was bound this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed from hand, look at five cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one grade 3 from among them and put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and if you put a card, discard a card from your hand.

name: Blue Wave Marine General, Galleass
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if you have four or more [Rest] rear-guards, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your grade 3 vanguard attacks, if your opponent's vanguard's current [Power] is different from its original [Power] , [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and [Stand] this unit.

name: Blue Wave Soldier Senior, Beragios
effect:
[CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if you have four or more [Rest] rear-guards, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed from hand, look at five cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one grade 3 from among them and put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and if you put a card, discard a card from your hand.

name: Onyx Dust Dragon
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, if "Blaster Dark" is not on your (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one "Blaster Dark", call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
[CONT](RC):If "Blaster Dark" is on your (RC), this unit gets "Boost".

name: Darkpride Dragon
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn, and you may put three cards from the top of your deck into your drop zone. If a grade 1 was put, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card.

name: Blue Espada Dragon
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, look at three cards from the top of your deck, reveal up to one "Claret Sword Dragon" or "Morion Spear Dragon" from among them, put it into your hand, put the rest into your drop zone, and if your drop zone has five or more grade 1 cards, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Jaggy Shot Dragoon
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When it attacks a vanguard, [COST][bind a card from your hand], choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, bind it, and if your opponent's front row has no rear-guards, you draw a card.
[AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle that it attacked, if your vanguard is "Dragonic Vanquisher", [COST][put this unit into your soul], and draw a card.

name: Demonic Dragon Berserker, Chatura
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When its attack hits a vanguard, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], draw a card, choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, and bind it.
[AUTO]:When bound from hand during your turn, you may call this card to (RC). If you called, this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Dragon Dancer, Anastasia
effect:
[CONT](GC):If your opponent's bind zone has three or more cards, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
[AUTO](RC):When your other unit is attacked, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and move this unit to (GC).

name: Fort Vessel Dragon
effect:
[AUTO](VC):When placed, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and your opponent's vanguard gets [Power] -5000 until end of turn.
[CONT](RC):If you have four or more [Rest] rear-guards and your vanguard is "Last Card, Revonn", this unit cannot be retired by your opponent's card effects, and gets [Power] +5000.

name: Blue Wave Marine General, Foivos
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When placed, if your vanguard is "Last Card, Revonn", [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & Rest] this unit], look at the top card of your deck, and call it to (RC).
[AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your grade 3 vanguard attacks, if your opponent's vanguard's current [Power] is different from its original [Power] , [COST][discard a card from your hand], and [Stand] this unit.

name: Battle Siren, Nerissa
effect:
[AUTO](RC):When [Rest] by another card's ability, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], [Stand] this unit, and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
[AUTO](RC):At the end of your turn, if you have four or more [Rest] rear-guards, [COST][put this unit into your soul], and draw a card.

name: Knight of Foolhardiness, Lughaid
effect:
[AUTO](VC/RC):When placed, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 2], retire any number of your rear-guards, your opponent chooses the same number of his or her rear-guards as the number of cards retired, and retires them.
[ACT](RC):[COST][Bind three grade 1 cards from your drop zone], and draw a card.

name: Witch of Iron Chains, Ness
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & retire a grade 1 rear-guard], your opponent chooses one of his or her rear-guards, retires it, and cannot intercept until end of turn.

name: Knight of Entrancement, Cailte
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If "Blaster Dark" is on your (VC) or (RC), this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Shield] +10000.

name: Witch of Extirpation, Bheara
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.
[AUTO](VC):When placed, draw a card, and discard a card from your hand.

name: Inflexible Arrow, Muorda
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your "Blaster Dark" in the same column as this unit [Stand], [COST][Soul-Blast 1], [Stand] this unit, and this unit gets [Power] +15000 until end of turn.

name: Blitz Caliber Dragon
effect: [CONT](VC):During your turn, if any player's card was bound this turn, this unit gets [Power] +20000.

name: Tactical Dagger Dragoon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When placed, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. You may switch all of your opponent's rear-guards between the front and back rows. (They all move simultaneously. The center column does not move)

name: Spinous Blader Dragon
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if any player's card was bound this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000.

name: Desert Gunner, Bhajan
effect:
[AUTO]:When bound from hand during your turn, you may call this card to (RC).
[AUTO](RC):When placed, if any player's card was bound this turn, [Soul-Charge 1].

name: Dragon Dancer, Eluisa
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.
[AUTO](VC):When placed, draw a card, and discard a card from your hand.

name: Sharp Split Dragon
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When it attacks a vanguard, [COST][[Rest] two rear-guards], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.

name: Press Stream Dragon
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card with "Maelstrom" in its card name from your hand"], and one of your vanguards with "Maelstrom" in its card name gets [Power] +10000/drive +1 until end of turn.

name: Blue Wave Shield General, Yorgos
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your vanguard is attacked, if you have four or more [Rest] rear-guards, you may move this unit to (GC).

name: Blue Ward Command
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO](GC):When placed, [COST][discard a card from your hand], and one of your units cannot be hit until end of that battle.
[AUTO](VC):When placed, draw a card, and discard a card from your hand.

name: Analyze Shooter
effect: [AUTO](RC):When the attack it boosted hits a vanguard, [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & discard a card from your hand], search your deck for up to two cards with "Maelstrom" in their different card names, reveal them and put them into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Astute Knight, Baddaden
effect: [ACT](VC/RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Retire two of your other rear-guards], call a card with grade less than or equal to the sum of the grades of the cards retired for this cost from your drop zone to (RC), and that unit and this unit get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Knight of Ferocity, Macmorna
effect:
[CONT](RC):When it would attack, this unit cannot attack unless you retire one of your other rear-guards.
[CONT](RC):If your drop zone has three or more grade 1 cards, this unit gets [Power] +15000.

name: Knight of Machinations, Abagdo
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When it attacks or boosts, [COST][retire one of your grade 1 rear-guards in another column], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.

name: Defitbau
effect: (This unit has intercept instead of boost)

name: Knight of Old Grudges, Matholuh
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When your rear-guard is retired by a card's ability, you may have this unit get [Power] +10000 until end of turn.

name: Promising Knight, David
effect: [AUTO]:When rode upon, draw a card.

name: Galvanic Mace Dragon
effect: [CONT](VC/RC):During the battle that this unit attacked, if your hand and rear-guards have a total of four or less cards, your opponent cannot call sentinels or grade 0 cards from hand.

name: Voltechshred Dragon
effect: [AUTO](RC):When it attacks, if your vanguard is "Dragonic Vanquisher", [COST][Soul-Blast 1], draw a card, and bind a card from your hand.

name: Thunder-lead Dragon
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Counter-Blast 2], choose one of your opponent's front row rear-guards, bind it, and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

name: Storm Attack Electrical Discharge Wyvern
effect: [AUTO](RC):When the attack it boosted hits a vanguard, if you have two or more rear-guards more than cards in your hand, draw a card.

name: Harbinger Dracokid
effect: [AUTO]:When rode upon, draw a card.

effect: (You may only have up to four cards with "[Heal] HEAL" in a deck.)

effect:

[CONT](RC):If it is in the back row, this unit gets [Power] +5000.

effect: [AUTO](VC):When it attacks, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 2, this unit gets drive +1 until end of that battle.
